attributes.action: Amend existing Food Labelling Regulations to incorporate a legal requirement for the labelling of all alchoholic drinks to include a symbol(s) and/or text to indicate the suitability or otherwise of the product for vegetarians, vegans and other affected consumers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Animal derivatives are widely used in the production of many alchoholic beverages. Although there are a number of products that indicate the use of such derivatives, a majority of the alchoholic beverages available do not state the use of animal derivatives in the manufacturing process and its presence as a trace ingredient in the product itself.

Please sign this petition if you believe that the existing Food Labelling Regulations should be amended to incorporate a legal requirement for all alchoholic beverages, irrespective of alchohol content or type, to be clearly labelled with a symbol(s) and/or text indicating the products suitability for pescetarians, vegetarians, vegans, and other affected consumers who have chosen not to purchase and consume products made using and/or containing animal derivatives.

government_responses.details:
